Gread markdown based note keeping. Love the minimialistic design while still providing customization when needed.
summary: Simple and elegant, loving the GUI style

description: a quantida de coisa que da pra fazer com esse app não ta escrito
super user-friendly and very customisable
Really not much better than EverNote - maybe if it was opensource and had a better UI, but yeah. No reason to change at this point.
summary: Really not much better than EverNote

description: Awsome notebook app, smoth and intuitive. Now with first plugins integration for OpenAI and HuggingFace tools. Free for personal use and can be adapted to work with Cloud Drives/ Remote Filesystems
summary: Safe and useful notetaker and more!

description: program does not use default browser (instead opens firefox for some reason)
summary: overall good, although a bug prevents me from giving it 5 stars

description: I use it every day and love it!
What exactly is this app? I wouldn't know if I hadn't installed it first.
this app is a dream come true, very good!
It's beautifull app for saving my experience.
Much better than EverNote and SimpleNote
But it would be fantastic if it might have source code available.
snap does not start without any error messages
summary: Snap does not start without any error messages

description: For years I tried Remember the Milk, Evernote, Notion.. but I kept coming back to a text file (Sublime Text) for day to day note taking. Now Obsidian makes text file note taking even easier, and so many slick features it can be expanded to a powerhouse if that's your thing. Totally frictionless note taking, with loads of flexibility in workflow.
I make a note in this app and sync it between all my devices
For some reason it does't start when I try to run app. It just not working via snap.
summary: Great app, been using it on my phone and windows pc

description: Might not be up to Ted Nelson standards of hypertext, but for us mortals this is probably as good as it gets.

I was a OneNote fan, but I wanted something non Microsoft, and not complex. Something that was simply Markdown.
I found this app which works on Linux/Windows and even Android.
I already now markdown syntax I can quickly type notes without having to use a mouse to apply visual markups. Addition learning of Obsidian commands I can link to other notes.

In summary.. great way to take notes, share with on other OS, and supports standand markdown out of the box.
summary: My go to for not taking and

description: I used Evernote for way too many years, just accepting the shortcomings of that tool. Obsidian is not polished or fancy in any way. Obsidian is made useful by the large number of add-ons provided by the developer community. With the add-ons and the ability to modify with simple scripts, or with JavaScript if so inclined, the tool can make many note taking and idea organization so much more useful. It can also just be a simple set of md files with little to no polish if you do not wish to augment the environment.
summary: Good tool for note taking and idea organization

description: This is awesome. It allows you to use Vim shortcuts. It has a Canvas feature now, which is super flexible and well integrated with your notes.
summary: The best note taking app I've ever seen

description: I use this app for study and my wiki, it works perfect for this!
zwar nicht open source aber sehr konfigurierbar und die dateien sind einfach nur markdowns also relativ zukunftssicher. man kann sich leicht verkünsteln aber der Grundbaustein ist echt ordentlich
summary: tut was es soll, gute Dateien

description: Desde la ultima actualización no arranca.
good app i use it to keep all my school notes

Obsidian is incredibly good. It's reliable, fast, private, doesn't lock your data like other note taking apps, and the links allow you to turn plain text into a neural network where all your knowledge is connected and grows with no limits. You can even link exact parts of .pdf files into your notes! can you imagine knowing where every single piece of knowledge you need is with just a few clics?...
 And the best thing is you can make it even better with a gargantuan library of open-source pluggins.
100% recommended for everyone.
summary: The best note taking app you can ever use

description: Esta buena para gente que quiere aprender en markdown, hay una buena cantidad de plugins y modulos....

Muy buena aplicación, la curva de aprendizaje no es tan rapida, pero despues, es bastante facil sobre todo si conoces Markdown, lo mejor es la velocidad con la que funciona y si sabes javascript, podes hacer tus propios plugin.
Это приложение избавило меня от многих костылей

Установил на Убунту 22.04. Все вроде понравилось но когда начал создовать #заголовки они не форматируются а просто сворачиваются в какую то маленькую выделенную форму. Копался но так и не смог понять что я делаю не так?! Ну и конечно интерфейс не адаптирован под "избранных" пользователей линукса!
summary: Очередной не допиленный шлак хотя потенциал огромный!

description: не запускается на 22.10
Не запускается на 22.10

Какому «гению» пришла в голову запихать отличную программу в пакет snap? Родная версия из AppImage работает просто великолепно. А этот snap постоянно тупит и глючит. И запросто может снести всю вашу накопленную базу.
